/* MM012003.selectListBuyMst */ SELECT BUYID , BUYDATE , OWNERNAME , ADDRESS , IFNULL(BUYM2, 0) AS BUYM2 , BUYAMT FROM mm_buymst WHERE 1 = 1
AND BUYDATE BETWEEN #S_BUYDATE_FR# AND #S_BUYDATE_TO#
AND BUYGUBUN = #S_BUYGUBUN#
AND ADDRESS LIKE '%$S_ADDRESS$%'
ORDER BY BUYDATE DESC, BUYID ASC

/* MM012003.selectListSaleMst */ SELECT A.SALEID , A.SALEDATE , A.CONNAME , IFNULL(A.CONM2, 0) AS CONM2 , B.DCRATE , B.SELLAMT , (SELECT DEPOSITDATE FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = A.SALEID AND DEPOSITGUBUN = '004' AND DEPOSITYN = 'Y') AS DEPOSITDATE , I.KNAME , I.BRANCHCODE , fn_codename('02', I.BRANCHCODE, NULL) AS NAME_BRANCHCODE FROM ( SELECT * FROM sa_salemst T WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT SALEID FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE SALEID = T.SALEID AND CHGGUBUN = '004') ) A INNER JOIN sa_saledtl B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst I ON A.SALERCD = I.INSACODE WHERE A.BUYID = #S_BUYID#
AND I.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND I.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
ORDER BY A.SALEDATE DESC, A.SALEID ASC
